name: Blue Ridge Entry Deck – 16x20 Freestanding Porch Plan
open_features: (12) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings with 6×6 posts
Railing: 4×4 posts with 2×4 rails, 2×2 balusters @5 in O.C. (≤4 in spacing)
Stairs: 2×12 stringers @12 in O.C. with 2×4 treads
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z bases, H1A hurricane ties, LPC4Z caps, A34 clips, and LSC connectors
Designed for freestanding installation near cabin, mobile home, or modular entry
safety_note: Plans are for preliminary educational use only. Verify site conditions, safety railings, and code compliance with a licensed professional before construction.
